text: Mladen Banović is a Croatian scientist specialised for transformers. He is a founder and editor-in-chief of the Transformers Magazine and director at Merit Services Int., a company specialized in R&D;, and education/training on transformers.Biography at MyTransfo. Access date 27 August 2019. He graduated in 1999 and obtained his doctorate in 2012 at the Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Computing of the University of Zagreb. He is an author of several scientific articles and works.List of published works in Hrčak and CROSBI 27 August 2019. == References == == External links == * Mladen Banović in Who is who in the Croatian science Category:Living people Category:Faculty of Science, University of Zagreb alumni Category:Croatian scientists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mladen Banović
